message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $250.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I believe I can offer you a fair price considering its value to me. I would like to propose a price of $180.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was really hoping to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can do $220, but that's as low as I can go.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, and I'd like to make a counteroffer of $200. This price reflects what I consider to be a fair valuation of the product for my needs.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again. However, I still need to make a profit. I can do $210, but that's as low as I can go. I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $205. This is a fair compromise between our positions.

I'm glad we're close, Bob. I think we're almost there. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get a bit closer to my target. I can do $215, but that's as low as I can go. I'm starting to think this is the best we're going to get.
I understand your situation, Alice. I am willing to pay $210 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise and respects both our interests.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $210, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. I'm starting to feel like we're at an impasse. I'll tell you what, I'll throw in a small bonus with the product if you're willing to meet me at $210. It's a one-time offer, and I'm only doing this because I really want to close the deal with you.
